(['stevedore – Manage Dynamic Plugins for Python Applications', 'stevedore – Manage Dynamic Plugins for Python Applications', 'plugins'], ['Python makes loading code dynamically easy, allowing you to configure
and extend your application by discovering and loading extensions
(”', '”) at runtime. Many applications implement their own
library for doing this, using ', ' or
', '. stevedore avoids creating yet another extension
mechanism by building on top of ', '. The code
for managing entry points tends to be repetitive, though, so stevedore
provides manager classes for implementing common patterns for using
dynamically loaded extensions.', 'Indices and tables', '
